name: Do-Hyeong Lee
details: Pursuing a Bachelor's degree in the school of electrical engineering at Hanyang University, Ansan, South Korea. His research interests include analog and digital circuit designs of clock and data recovery (CDR).

name: Han-Gil Yoo
details: Pursuing a Bachelor's degree in the school of electrical engineering at Hanyang University, Ansan, South Korea. His research interests include analog and digital circuit designs of processing in memory (PiM).
